extendedInfo.description: This is the Lite (Ad Supported) Version of Range Finder ProThe application allows you to quickly and easily determine ranges with your Mil Dot Scope.No need to waste time fiddling with your keyboard to enter information into the application. The simple to use interface allows quick and easy calculations.Use the slider bars for larger adjustments and the plus and minus buttons to fine tune your input.I am always looking to improve my apps so if you have any suggestions please feel free to post them.If you don't have any suggestions, but like the app please rate.

reviews.title: Ok app for free
reviews.comment: Can\'t back out of app with back button but good app otherwise
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent, but needs refining.
reviews.comment: Can only select mil dot sizes in whole integers. That can lead to deviations of over 100 yards. Would be great if it was changed to accept mil dot sizes in tenths.
reviews.author: A Google User
